alert.note: Alert for Northern Coos; Northern Grafton; Southern Coos; Southern Grafton (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 20 at 12:03AM EST until January 20 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...SNOW IMPACTS THE AREA TONIGHT THROUGH FRIDAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations between 2 and 8 inches for a storm total of 3 to 9 inches. * WHERE...Portions of south central, west central, and western Maine. Portions of northern New Hampshire. * WHEN...Until 7 PM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Periods of moderate and heavy snow will combine with low visibility to create dangerous driving conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Friday morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by going to newengland511.org

area.areaDesc: Northern Coos; Northern Grafton; Southern Coos; Southern Grafton
